item.title: Report X-2024101011
item.description:
Report X-2024101011

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-24T09:29:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-12
  • City: RENO
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 10/11/2024 at approximately 2015, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 5570334 at the station location in Reno, reporting undeclared dangeorus goods. The shipment consisted of one fiberboard box, containing 8 lithium ion batteries. The shipment was suspected of improper preparation after being previously refused at the counter. The shipper later applied the lithium battery mark and tendered the shipment again. Further investigation revealed that the each of the inner packages were labeled UN 3480, indicating that the shipment should have been tendered as fully regulated dangerous goods. The shipment is being held, pending an FAA investigation.

item.title: Report X-2024101210
item.description:
Report X-2024101210

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-22T09:15:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-08
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED UP TO B SIDE SORT AISLE FOR LEAKING PACKAGE. WENT TO SORT AISLE TO GRAB LEAKER THERE WAS NO LIQUID JUST GLASS AND STAINED PACKAGE. CAME BACK TO DMP TO PROCESS NOTICED 1 BROKEN BOTTLE AND 3 OTHER HAMZMAT BOTTLES IN PACKAGE, DICHLOROMETHANE / ACETONITRILE / TOLUENE / ACETIC ACID, GLACIAL. DAMAGE INSPECTION; LEAKER - DICHLOROMETHANE LEAKED, UNDECLARED.
